CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 45 However , the PCE of the random terpolymers showed a the nonlinear compositional dependence from 2 to 6% in the order P3 ( 5.61% ) > P4 ( 5.26% ) > P2 ( 4.91% ) > P5 ( 3.02% ) > P6 ( 2.09% ) ; this was consistent with the observed trend of the J SC .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities can be identified as follows:

1. P3: This refers to the third material or polymer being studied.
2. P4: This refers to the fourth material or polymer being studied.
3. P2: This refers to the second material or polymer being studied.
4. P5: This refers to the fifth material or polymer being studied.
5. P6: This refers to the sixth material or polymer being studied.

Therefore, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are: P3, P4, P2, P5, and P6.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. P3
2. P4
3. P2

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to a "Material Name".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name", presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P3 |
| P4 |
| P2 |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
